name: Dream in the garden
description:
A man works hard for his dream

w,a,s,d mobile, can pick destination plants

Stones are obstacles, explosives can be purchased in stores,

After a month at a time, he died at age 80,

Before then pick for gold, shop for upgrades, pause menu can set volume

Plants grow and fall automatically, and have different values at different times

一个男人为了梦想努力耕耘

w,a,s,d 移动 ，可采摘目的地的植物

石头是障碍，可在商店购买炸药，

每次移动经过一个月，80岁时死亡，

在此之前采摘获取金币，商店获取升级，暂停菜单可设置音量

植物会自动生长和凋落，不同的时间段价值也不一样
